mapper.insert: INSERT INTO role (NAME, Remark, IsDeleteFlag, CreaterId, CreaterName, CreateDateTime,roleType) VALUES(#{name}, #{remark}, #{isDeleteFlag}, #{createrId}, #{createrName}, #{createDateTime},#{roleType})
mapper.update: UPDATE role SET NAME=#{name}, Remark=#{remark},roleType=#{roleType} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT ID,NAME, Remark, IsDeleteFlag, CreaterId, CreaterName, CreateDateTime,roleType FROM role where id=#{id}
SELECT ID,NAME, Remark, IsDeleteFlag, CreaterId, CreaterName, CreateDateTime,roleType FROM role where roleType=#{userFranchiseesId}
select r.* from role r INNER JOIN role_userinfo ru on r.ID = ru.Role_ID INNER JOIN userinfo u on u.ID = ru.UserInfo_ID where u.ID = #{userId}
